Manslaughter trial begins for motorcyclist charged with deaths of Geoffrey and Karen Boucher https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/manslaughter-trial-begins-for-motorclist-charded-charged-with-deaths-of-geoffrey-and-karen-and-karen/re6x6x6x6 idggwzcadfxbggtnihrd7sq/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/manslaughter-trial-begins-for-motorclist-charded-charged-with-deaths-of-geoffrey-and-karen-and-karen/re6x6x6x6 idggwzcadfxbggtnihrd7sq/ Hannah BartlettThe motorcyclist accepts he caused the couple's deaths but argues it isn't manslaughter. Thu, 27 Mar 2025 06:00:00 +0000 Geoffrey and Karen Boucher were hit by a motorcycle as they crossed a highway at Bethlehem, near Tauranga. The bike's rider now faces manslaughter charges in the High Court at Rotorua.
Gang member who imported nearly 200kg of drugs while in prison handed life sentence https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/gang-member-who-imported-nearly-200kg-drugs-while-inile-in-in-in-in-in-in-in-inford-sentence/cldmifunkzftlm4brnsfpxcixa/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/gang-member-who-imported-nearly-200kg-drugs-while-inile-in-in-in-in-in-in-in-inford-sentence/cldmifunkzftlm4brnsfpxcixa/ Jared SavageThe 'revered' gangster known as 'Plata o Plomo' was already serving a long prison term. Thu, 27 Mar 2025 03:41:01 +0000 Just under 200kg of methamphetamine was hidden inside four thresher machines imported from Dubai. Two gang members have since pleaded guilty to arranging the importation from inside prison. Photo / NZ Police
